elements.name: question2
elements.title: What are two important legal bases for apprenticeships?
elements.correctAnswer: Federal Constitution (FC) and the Swiss Code of Obligations (CO).

elements.name: question8
elements.title: What right do you have in relation to your training at the training company? Please also state the legal basis.
elements.correctAnswer: the right to professional training, Art. 344 OR

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What obligation in relation to your learning assignment do you enter into with the apprenticeship contract? Please also state the legal basis.
elements.correctAnswer: the duty to do everything possible to achieve the teaching objective, Art. 345 OR

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What rights do you have in relation to your activities in the training company? Please also state the legal basis.
elements.correctAnswer: the right to activities that are related to the profession and promote training, Art. 345a CO
